wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.withdrawalInfo: The account from which funds can be withdrawn.
wallet.holdInfo: Frozen funds. Soon they will be credited to the account for payments.

payment.title: Replenishment
payment.split: You can buy Telegram Stars without KYC, with a profit of up to 40% on the Split platform!
payment.walletInfo: Pay in TON, USDT-TON, DOGS, NOT, HMSTR, JETTON and other tokens of the TON network by connecting a TON wallet.
payment.toBalance: It will be credited to the balance

name.label: Subscription name
name.tooltip: Subscription name, which will be displayed in the subscription list.

privileges.oneBaseServer: One base server to choose from
privileges.oneBaseOrPremiumServer: One base or premium server to choose from
privileges.accessBaseAndPremiumServers: Access to {{baseCount}} base and {{premiumCount}} premium servers
privileges.trafficPlan: No expiration date, pay only for traffic!

options.title: Options
options.info: Subscription will be automatically renewed from your balance.

freePlan.trialAvailable: You have access to {gb} Gb of bonus traffic for an unlimited Trial subscription.
freePlan.modalConfirmation: Do you really want to activate the trial period?

bonuses.title: Bonuses
bonuses.paymentTitle: For the actions of a friend
bonuses.inviteInfo: After the first payment by a friend or activation of the trial period!
bonuses.paymentInfo: Get a percentage of our income for friends and those who have been invited by your friends forever!
bonuses.lvl2Info: Those who were invited by friends
bonuses.lvl3Info: Those who were invited by friends of friends üòÅ

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.earnInfo: You've earned it all the time
statistics.inviteInfo: Invited | Activated | Of these, the Standard | Of these, Premium

greenCheck.danger:
Your connection is NOT secure!
Connect a VPN!

subscriptions.title: Subscription
subscriptions.noSubscriptions: You don't have any subscriptions yet
subscriptions.subscriptionDataUpdated: Subscription data has been successfully updated
subscriptions.changeServerWarning: WARNING: Changing the server takes 2 minutes. After changing the server, you need to update the data in the application!

errors.serverLimitReached: You have reached the server limit
errors.serverLimitReachedPremium: You have reached the premium server limit
errors.serverLimitReachedBase: You have reached the base server limit

delete.title: Deleting a subscription
delete.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your subscription? It will be impossible to restore it! No compensation is provided!

qr.title: QR code of the subscription
qr.description: Scan it in the client application

refresh.title: Subscription data reset
refresh.message: Are you sure you want to reset the subscription data? After this, the keys and subscription address will be changed to new ones! You will need to add the subscription to the application again! Usually, a reset is done if your subscription has leaked to the network or someone has gained access to it!

autoRenewal.enableMessage: Do you want to enable automatic subscription renewal? Funds will be automatically debited when the subscription expires.
autoRenewal.disableMessage: Do you want to disable automatic subscription renewal? After expiration, the subscription will be deactivated.

renew.title: Subscription renewal
renew.message: Do you want to renew your subscription? {price} stars will be deducted from your balance.
